heading: Today
text: Partly cloudy in the morning, then increasing sunshine from the west. Highs in the 70s, some 80s possible in the warmest valleys. Light wind.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear. Areas of river valley fog. Lows from the mid to upper 40s in the north east, increasing to the low 50s in the south and west. Light and variable wind.

heading: Monday
text: Valley fog burning off to mostly sunny skies. Highs from the 70s to nearing 80 in the warmest valleys.
